plot: Lewis Brindley and Simon Lane chase down the malicious creature known as Israphel, to save the kidnapped Blacksmith, Daisy.
plot_en: Lewis Brindley and Simon Lane chase down the malicious creature known as Israphel, to save the kidnapped Blacksmith, Daisy.
plot_es: Lewis Brindley and Simon Lane chase down the malicious creature known as Israphel, to save the kidnapped Blacksmith, Daisy.
title: Shadow of Israphel
